direction.description: Layout direction, can be set to row column
direction.description_zh: 布局方向，可设置为行列

justify.description: Main axis arrangement, Can be set to flex-start flex-end center space-around space-between
justify.description_zh: 主轴布置，可设置为柔性启动柔性端中心间距-周围间距-间距

align.description: Cross axis arrangement, Can be set to stretch center flex-start flex-end baseline
align.description_zh: 交叉轴布置，可设置为拉伸中心挠性-启动挠性-端基线

size.description: Spacing, can be set to mini small normal large or [Vertical, Horizontal](Support length unit)
size.description_zh: 间距，可设置为迷你小号、普通大号或【垂直、水平】（支撑长度单位）

wrap.description: Whether to exceed the line break
